dcterms:creator: I. Gullo
F. Grillo
L. Mastracci
A. Vanoli
M. Fassan
dcterms:description: The PDAC Dataset consists of 523 hyperspectral imaging scenes from 36 patients, with 255 scenes belonging to pancreatic ductal adenocarcinoma (PDAC) and the rest being normal. The dataset is split into 331 for training, 101 for validation, and 91 for testing, with each scene containing 40 spectral bands ranging from 450 nm to 750 nm.
dcterms:title: PDAC Dataset

dcterms:creator: I. Gullo
F. Grillo
L. Mastracci
A. Vanoli
M. Fassan
dcterms:description: The PLGC Dataset contains 1105 hyperspectral imaging scenes, including 414 cases of intestinal metaplasia (IM), 362 cases of dysplasia (DYS), and 329 normal cases. The dataset is split into 661 for training, 221 for validation, and 223 for testing, with each scene containing 32 spectral bands ranging from 470 nm to 670 nm.
dcterms:title: PLGC Dataset
